step_explanation: Step 6 first erroneously counts Sunday, Tuesday, and Thursday as 4 days instead of 3 days, resulting in an error in the divisor in the formula. And step 6 calculates 168/4=42 instead of 168/3=56, resulting in the final incorrect answer. The first step to make a mistake, which is the root cause of the miss, is step 6, so pred_wrong_step is 6

Step 6 first erroneously counts Sunday, Tuesday, and Thursday as 2 days instead of 3 days, resulting in an error in the divisor in the formula. And step 6 calculates 168/2=84 instead of 168/3=56, resulting in the final incorrect answer. The first step to make a mistake, which is the root cause of the miss, is step 6, so pred_wrong_step is 6
